articles.description: In a new interview with Ellen DeGeneres, US chat show legend Oprah made the admission.
articles.content:
Oprah Winfrey has confessed she "did not care" about her celebrity talk show guests.
In a new interview with Ellen DeGeneres, US chat show legend Oprah made the admission.
The admission comes month… [+1293 chars]

articles.title: Laing O'Rourke signs £600m London Olympia contract - Construction Enquirer
articles.description: Demolition to start on main central hall after a year of enabling works
articles.content: The deal with developer Yoo Capital and Deutsche Finance International triggers a start to demolition of Olympia Central and follows the signing of  Trafalgar Entertainment as the tenant for the site… [+1960 chars]
